alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 17 at 7:09PM CDT until April 17 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTY... At 708 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Carson, or 14 miles southwest of Collins, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Jefferson Davis County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
